name: Ino szczyloj
description:
Ino szczyloj! game was made during the 24-hour Space Jam V on 6-7th December 2019 in Kraków.

Ino szczyloj! (Just shoot it!) is an adventurous shooter game placed in a cyber world of the Moon.
In the endless war between Light and Dark side new lands were contested.
Our hero — Flash — is deployed by the Light Republic to prevent the further expansion of the darkness and cast some light on the Moon.

  • Run fast as Flash to avoid enemies
  • Summon your dark side — Voider — to fight enemies and destroy buildings
  • Complete objectives to clear the levels

Technology:

  • Unity
  • MagicaVoxel
  • Mixamo

Authors:

  • Mateusz Biedrzyński
  • Marta Ciecholewska
  • Dariusz Halama

Credits:

  • Free Music from Bensound
  • Particle Effects by https://archanor.com/assets.html
